context.description: Command Assistant wizard Use this wizard to create, modify or delete runtime components, such as brokers, in the IBM Integration Toolkit.

topic.label: Configuring brokers for a development environment

context.description: Default Configuration wizard - Create Use this wizard to create the IBM Integration Default Configuration. When you have created the Default Configuration, you can deploy and run the IBM Integration sample applications.

topic.label: What the Default Configuration wizard does

context.description: Default Configuration wizard - Remove Use this wizard to remove the IBM Integration Default Configuration. When you have deleted the Default Configuration, you can no longer deploy and run the IBM Integration sample applications. Use the wizard if you want to recreate the Default Configuration.

Prepare the Samples wizard Use this wizard to prepare or remove a IBM Integration sample. If you have created the Default Configuration, you can also deploy a sample so that you can run it. If you have not created the Default Configuration, you can still import a sample into the IBM Integration Toolkit so that you can explore the samples resources without actually running the sample. Run this wizard for each sample that you want to import or remove.
Prepare the Samples wizard - task Select a task to perform on the sample.
